name: BODYGUARD TASK FORCE
description:
Welcome to 'Bodyguard Task Force,' the VR game that puts you in the shoes of a bodyguard on a mission to ensure the safety of VIPs. Play solo or team up online for cooperative play as you navigate through a variety of missions, each presenting unique challenges. From urban landscapes to potential threats, every bullet counts in this heart-pounding experience. Compete on the leaderboard to showcase your skills and become the ultimate protector.

Features:

  • Play Solo or team up with 3 other friends in multiplayer Coop.
  • Deploy a variety of weapons and attachments.
  • Diverse missions set in a range of environments for you to select from.
  • Unpredictable enemies each playthrough.
  • Compete to attain the highests ranks on the global leaderboard.
